replies.message: Hey guys im ben my artist name is  'PeAce' im a rapper from the UK (Birmingham) i know no body will read this but maybe 1 will  i work all day and all night to get my voice heard i graft realy hard i have a big dream to get big in this game i dont want fame i just want to get my voice heard guys it will mean alot if you take 3 minutes of your time to check me out i have just released a new music video you will no be disappointed  thanks people means alot http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=A3w9kGFW0v0
